CustomField.description: Salesforce won't automatically create Payments for the selected Opportunity record types. Control or Command click to select more than one record type.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: NPSP automatically creates Payment records for Opportunities of all record types. Select any record types here that you don't want Payment records automatically created for. Control or Command click to select more than one record type.
CustomField.label: Excluded Opp Record Types
